testcase.name: should have CI environment variable set in CI
should have Node.js version 18 or higher
should have required test dependencies available
should have proper test timeout configured
should support TypeScript
should have test environment configured correctly
should be configured to collect coverage
should support JUnit XML reporting

testcase.classname: CI/CD Setup Verification › Mock Environment Variables
testcase.name: should handle missing environment variables gracefully
should process valid UPC-A barcode (12 digits)
should process valid UPC-E barcode (8 digits)
should process valid EAN-13 barcode (13 digits)
should reject invalid barcode formats
should handle scan result processing errors gracefully
should have default configuration
should allow configuration updates
should create scanner with custom configuration
should connect successfully on first attempt
should retry on connection failure and eventually succeed
should throw error after max retry attempts
should find product by UPC
should return null when product not found
should save user profile successfully
should save scan history successfully
should disconnect successfully
should create dietary analysis service
should handle missing API keys gracefully

testcase.classname: AI Service Integration › Dietary Analysis Service
testcase.name: should provide fallback analysis when AI services fail

testcase.classname: AI Service Integration › Dietary Analysis Service
testcase.name: should detect violations in fallback mode

testcase.classname: AI Service Integration › Dietary Analysis Service
testcase.name: should return safe for products without violations

testcase.classname: AI Service Integration › Dietary Analysis Service
testcase.name: should handle empty ingredients gracefully

testcase.classname: AI Service Integration › Dietary Analysis Service
testcase.name: should handle empty restrictions gracefully
should track service status
should get current service status
renders initial state correctly
shows scanner when scan button is pressed
processes valid barcode scan correctly
handles scan errors correctly
closes scanner when close button is pressed
displays last scanned barcode
renders correctly when permission is granted
